entry.title: Molizanee/postgresql-schema-extractor: A lightweight tool to automatically extract and document your PostgreSQL database schema. This tool generates a comprehensive JSON file containing detailed information about tables, columns, data types, constraints, and primary keys.
entry.content: A lightweight tool to automatically extract and document your PostgreSQL database schema. This tool generates a comprehensive JSON file containing detailed information about tables, columns, data types, constraints, and primary keys.

entry.title: Utsav-Tatva/lightweight-charts-trendline-plugin

RenOosuke/SvelteAndNWJSForWindowsXP: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).
entry.content: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).

entry.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
entry.content: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

entry.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. entry.content: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
